name: StupidDeviceTricks
0:
”Alexa, open stupid device tricks and give me something.”
”Alexa, launch stupid device tricks and give me a trick.”
”Alexa, start stupid device tricks and tell me a trick.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stupid device tricks
des: This skill will give you randomly selected questions or requests that you can say to your Alexa-enabled device, to which your device will give responses that are likely to be funny or strange. All of these responses are built into Alexa. Some are "Easter eggs," and some are simply unusual ways to use features built into Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
